translation.en: Okay. All right, one, two, three...
Guys! One...
Hold on. Guys, freeze!
ALVIN: Hey, Dave. Where's Alvin?
Where have you been? Where have I been?
Trying to board the ship.
Already done that. Also, checked out our room,
dibbed the side of the bed closest to the window,
ordered us a round of virgin pina coladas
and signed us up for parasailing.
Alvin, you're too young for parasailing.
I thought we were going on vacation to have fun.
Don't worry, family vacations are all about fun.
But first we're gonna need to set some rules.
Let's start with you can't call dibs on a bed until everyone's in the room.
That's right. ELEANOR: Good rule.
That's a good one, Simon. All right, so that's our first rule.
translation.ko: 좋아, 사이먼 그게 첫 번째 규칙

translation.en: Should we go over the rest of them?
Dave, come on. "Rules" is my middle name.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 말아요, 데이브 규칙 하면 나잖아요

translation.en: Alvin! Hey, Dave.
This is your captain speaking.
All kids are now allowed to play on the adults-only Serenity Deck.
translation.ko: 어린이들의 어른 전용 갑판 출입을 허용합니다

translation.en: (GRUNTING)
Alvin!
Alvin!
We talked about setting rules, Alvin.
I'm sorry.
I didn't know the agreement meant no fun.
You're allowed to have fun.
When are you going to stop acting like a child?
When are you going to stop treating me like a child?
I'll stop treating you like a child when you start acting like a grown-up!
translation.ko: 어른처럼 굴면 애 취급 안 할게

translation.en: I'll start acting like a grown-up when you start...
CHIPETTES: Aw. Hey, girls, not now, please, okay?
SIMON: Sorry, Dave. ALVIN: Lame!
I need to get ready for dinner with the captain.
(GASPS) We're having dinner with the captain?
No, I am. You're staying here.
I have to go apologize for everything Alvin did.
translation.ko: 앨빈이 사고 친 거 사과하는 자리야

translation.en: This is so not fair. Not to us, not to Dave,
translation.ko: 이건 아니잖아? 우린 물론이고 선장님한테도 불공평하다고

translation.en: and certainly not to the captain,
who I'm sure was really looking forward to dining with me.
translation.ko: 나랑 저녁 먹는 걸 기대하고 계실 텐데

translation.en: Why don't I go speak with Dave? See if I can smooth things over.
translation.ko: 내가 잘 말해볼게 맘 바꾸게 잘 구슬려볼게

translation.en: SIMON: Knock-knock.
What is it, Simon?
Well, I would never say this to Alvin.
Goodness knows he can be totally irresponsible,
but I actually have a suggestion.
You have a suggestion for me?
He's been driving me crazy a lot longer than he's been driving you crazy.
translation.ko: 데이브보단 제가 더 앨빈한테 많이 당해봤죠

translation.en: All right. So what is it?
Imagine Alvin is a spirited racehorse.
That's your advice?
No. I'm not done yet, Dave.
All right, so Alvin is a racehorse...
And you, Dave, are his incredibly helpful jockey
who's there to guide him down the racetrack of life.
But if you hold the reins too tight, that racehorse is going to fight and buck,
translation.ko: 고삐를 너무 세게 쥐면 경주마는 말 안 들어요

translation.en: which is no fun for anyone.
But if you loosen the reins just a little...
He'll fly right off the track and crash into the fence.
I know you want to protect Alvin,
but, Dave, sometimes kids will rise to the occasion
if you just show them a little trust.
All right, guys, room service is on its way. Lights out by 9:00.
Dave, question.
If we're going to be held captive in this room...
Because of Alvin!
Can we at least watch a movie?
All right, let's see what's on.
You know what, why don't you guys pick a movie?
You're old enough to make your own decision.
For real, Dave?
Absolutely.
Ooh! Dave looks so elegant.
Have fun!
Wait, Dave, before you go, I made something for you.
Wow, it's really...
It's soft so you can sleep in it
and I made it with all the colors, so it will go with everything!
translation.ko: 여러 가지 색깔을 넣어서 아무 옷에나 잘 어울려요

translation.en: Great. I'll put it on after dinner.
You could put it on now, so everyone at the captain's table could see it.
translation.ko: 지금 해야 해요 그래야 사람들이 보죠

translation.en: ALVIN: (LAUGHING) Nice. A real chick magnet.
All right, guys, have fun.
But not too much fun, because I'm still very upset.
translation.ko: 너무 신나게는 안 돼 나 아직 화나 있거든

translation.en: Goodbye, Dave.
And, hello, ladies!
translation.ko: 안녕, 아가씨들! 그럼 지금부터 꼬리 흔들고 다녀볼까?

translation.en: (MIMICKING SEAN CONNERY) I like my tail shaken, not stirred.
Where are you going?
To the casino. I'm feeling lucky.
Oh, no. No, no, no, no. Dave said...
translation.ko: 안 돼, 절대 안 돼 데이브가...

translation.en: Dave said, and I quote, (CLEARS THROAT)
"We're old enough to make our own decisions."
He meant we were old enough to choose a film!
Well, we're clearly not. Check out what Theodore just picked.
translation.ko: 테오가 무슨 영화를 골랐는지 보고 말해

translation.en: (CHEERFUL MUSIC PLAYING)
What's wrong with this movie?
It's for babies!
Which is probably why Dave treats us like babies.
translation.ko: 이래서 데이브가 우릴 애 취급하는 거야

translation.en: Munk up, Theodore.
There. That's more like it.
Alvin, please!
I say we go to Salsa Night!
In our pajamas?
Oh, I know!
Alvin!
Alvin! Alvin!
And we have a winner.
Ellie, I love these dresses!
You're so crafty.
Thanks. It's what I do.
Ow! Oh! Sorry!
Ew! What are you?
(LAUGHS) We are the Chipettes.
Hi, I'm Eleanor!
My sister was just trying to apologize.
What's she sorry for? Stepping on my friend's foot?
translation.ko: 뭘 사과해? 내 친구 발 밟은 거? 아니면 춤이 엉망인 거?

translation.en: Or her busted, tired little dance moves?
translation.ko: 내 친구 발 밟은 거? 아니면 춤이 엉망인 거?

translation.en: Oh, no, you didn't!
Oh, yes, she did!
You better get those Lee Press-Ons out of my face
unless you want to meet my claws.
And, yeah, baby, they're real.
Hit it! Do you wanna go?
DAVE: Captain, I'm really sorry about what happened.
Alvin, he's a kid. He's just trying to have some fun.
There's nothing wrong with fun.
Our pelican makes sure that everybody on the ship has fun.
In fact, in port, he circles the ship on a hang glider.
It's really quite amusing.
However, my number one priority is the passengers' safety.
So I simply cannot have Alvin put himself, or anyone else, at risk again.
translation.ko: 앨빈이나 딴 사람이 다쳐선 안 되죠

translation.en: Believe me, I understand.
If Alvin breaks any more of our rules, there will be consequences.
translation.ko: 앨빈이 또 말썽 피우면 그땐 정말 벌 줄 거예요

translation.en: The last thing we want is anyone getting hurt.
Excuse me.
Hot! WAITER: Sorry. Hot!
Unbelievable. Gravy pants.
Do you have a problem with me?
You bet I have a problem with you.
Why? As if you didn't know.
I don't know.
Ian? What are you doing here?
I'm working, Dave.
This is your job?
Yeah, not too many record labels are interested in hiring the guy
who blew it with the Chipmunks, blew it with the Chipettes
and passed on Justin Bieber.
Twice.
Look, Ian, I'm sorry you lost your job and your dignity.
translation.ko: 직장 잃고 이런 일 하는 건 안됐지만

translation.en: But spilling things, hot things, on me isn't going to bring any of that stuff back.
translation.ko: 나한테 뜨거운 국물 쏟는다고 달라질 건 없어

translation.en: You're right, Dave. It's too late for me to get my old life back.
translation.ko: 맞아, 데이브 내 삶은 못 되찾지

translation.en: But it's not too late to ruin yours.
translation.ko: 하지만 네 삶을 망칠 순 있어!

translation.en: You want to ruin my life?
Why don't we just start with this vacation?
If I see those chipmunks break so much as one rule,
I'm going straight to Captain Correlli.
You're in my house now!
Although, technically it's not a house, it's a ship.
The point is, I'll be watching you.
Like a hawk!
Theodore?
Please don't eat my brain!
Why are you watching Jungle Monster 4?
Alvin, how could you...
Alvin?
Simon?
Girls?
Oh, no. No, no, no, no, no, no, no!
(GASPS) I'll be right back!
It's dark. (DOOR SHUTS)
You're up for an International Music Award. That's fantastic!
translation.ko: 국제 음악 대상 후보? 진짜 멋지다

translation.en: Yeah, it's pretty cool.
I guess. If you like a lot of adulation.
We fly there right after the cruise. Hoping to take home Record of the Year.
translation.ko: 배에서 내리면 갈 건데 아마 우리가 탈 거예요

translation.en: That would make you the youngest winner ever.
I'm not that young.
I mean, I'm hanging out in a casino way past my bedtime.
Not that I have a bedtime! (LAUGHS NERVOUSLY) No one tells me what to do.
translation.ko: 잘 시간이 정해진 건 아녜요 내가 자고 싶을 때 자죠

translation.en: DAVE: Alvin!
Who's Alan, I wonder?
Anyway.
I'd love to chat more, but I've gotta run.
You're in a lot of trouble, young man!
ALVIN: You can follow me on Critter!
Alvin! Alvin!
Simon?
I wasn't betting. Honest.
Your winnings, sir.
Oh, busted!
I didn't sneak out. I mean, I did. But only to stop Alvin.
Right. IAN: There they are, Captain.
Captain.
ALVIN: What's he going to do, make us walk the plank?
(GASPS) There's a plank?
No, there's no plank, but if you guys disobey me one more time,
translation.ko: 그건 아니지만 또 말 안 들으면 배에서 쫓겨나고

translation.en: you will be off the ship.
translation.ko: 또 말 안 들으면 배에서 쫓겨나고

translation.en: And you'll miss the International Music Awards. Do you understand?
Yes, Dave. Uh-huh.
Absolutely.
What if we need to disobey you?
And why would you need to do that?
Well, let's say that you tell me to stay put.
"Alvin, if you move from that chair, you're grounded!"
But then I happen to see pirates
climbing up ropes, ever so stealthy, from the side of the ship.
Now, it would be easy for me
to take my trusty old Swiss Army knife and cut the ropes.
But I have to stay put. Or do I?
Yes, Alvin, you do. And what are you doing with a pocket knife?
translation.ko: 그래도 가만있어 만능 칼은 또 뭐야?

translation.en: What pocket knife are you referring to?
translation.ko: 무슨 만능 칼? 난 그런 거 몰라요

translation.en: Come on, give it to me. You could cut yourself.
So, I could have saved the whole ship from robbage and pilgering
and you'd still ground me?
Alvin, there's no such word as robbage. And it's "pillaging."
But he does have a point, Dave.
There's got to be times when you trust us to take matters into our own hands.
I trusted you tonight and look where that got me!
That's probably just the hot gravy talking.
You're all lucky Captain Correlli has allowed you one more activity.
Is it hang gliding, wakeboarding, or bungee jumping?
No. Shuffleboard.
(ALL GROAN) ALVIN: Man!
By my calculations,
it appears to be 10% shuffle, 90% bored.
(GIGGLES) That's funny!
translation.ko: 재미는 달랑 10% 지루함은 무려 90%예요 그 말 웃긴다

translation.en: Oh, Thanks. You really think so?
You know, Dave, I think I'd prefer the plank.
Sorry, Alvin, but this is what you get to do.
And I get to do something I haven't done in a long time.
translation.ko: 난 아주 오랫동안 못했던 걸 할 거야

translation.en: Absolutely nothing.
ALVIN: Brittany approaches her puck,
adjusts her stance, looks over at me, quite annoyed,
wonders to herself if I'm ever going to shut my mouth,
realizes I'm not, and makes her move.
And... Oh!
Oh, it's short! (LAUGHING)
A costly error, ladies and gentlemen,
that's going to haunt her the rest of her career.
You can make all the jokes you want, Alvin,
but not even you can make this interesting.
Oh, really? Well, care to make it interesting that I can make this interesting?
Alvin, what are you up to? Need I remind you Dave is watching us.
Simon, the poor guy hasn't had a moment's peace since he met us.
translation.ko: 우릴 만난 이후로 한 번도 못 쉬어서

translation.en: He's exhausted.
Check this out. In three, two, one.
Lights out.
Nap time! (SNORING)
Time to turn punishment into funishment.
translation.ko: 우린 이제부터 벌을 벌로 받는 거야

translation.en: (LAUGHING) You get it?
I took the "pun" in punishment, and turned it into "fun,"
but kept the "ishment." It's word play!
What? Uh-huh.
ALVIN: Hey, kid!
Wanna make a trade? That's a nice-looking kite.
I can see Russia from here!
Come on, Simon, grab on.
Forget it. All I ever do is try to save him
and it only gets me in trouble!
This won't end well.
Simon, do something!
Oh, seriously?
Simon, help!
Alvin's gotten himself in a bind. Looks like it's Simon saving him again!
translation.ko: 사고는 앨빈이 치고 뒷수습은 내가 하고!

translation.en: (LAUGHS) Thanks, bro.
No!
Thank you! Huh?
(PASSENGERS EXCLAIMING IN SURPRISE)
SIMON: Dave! Dave! Ow!
ALL: Dave!
THEODORE: Help us!
DAVE: Guys! Guys!
No! No! No, no, no! No! No!
CHIPMUNKS: Dave! Help us!
Oh, yeah.
Oh, no, no, no, no, no.
You want to go hang gliding,
sign up at the Excursion Desk like everyone else.
Ian, you don't understand!
Oh, I think I do.
Dave Seville is so special that the rules don't apply to him.
Let go! No, you let go.
IAN: Hey! Come on! Great!
DAVE: Oh, my God!
IAN: I need my pelican head!
DAVE: Help!
Ian! You idiot!
Oh, no. No, no.
Great. Way to go, Seville.
Me? Yeah, you!
Save your breath, Dave. They'll come back for me.
translation.ko: 힘 빼지 마 날 구하러 올 거야

translation.en: In retrospect, this was a bad idea.
We're losing altitude!
I don't think I can make it much longer.
I'm so hungry. Just one bite.
No.
A nibble? No nibbles.
Maybe I can just lick the glaze?
The glaze is what's keeping you alive, Theodore!
Its high fat content is creating a waterproof barrier.
translation.ko: 그 고 지방층 덕분에 물에 떠 있는 거야

translation.en: I'm gonna starve to death!
Actually, there are many other things that will kill you before starvation.
translation.ko: 굶어 죽는 거 말고도 죽을 이유는 많아

translation.en: Dehydration, sunstroke...
(GASPS) An island.
No, an island would probably be helpful.
So if you see one, you should definitely say something.
Uh, Jeanette?
(LAUGHING) We're alive! We're alive!
Good. Because now
I'm going to kill you!
Guys, guys, guys! Nobody is killing anyone, okay?
No matter how much he deserves it.
Thank you, Si. Though I could have done without the passive aggression.
(CLEARS THROAT) Look, we've got nothing to worry about.
Dave knows we're gone by now.
He probably has the whole coast guard looking for us.
Meantime, why don't we all just relax and have some donut?
Did you guys want some?
Theodore! Alvin! Simon!
Can't you kick any faster?
It's been two hours, Dave.
Thanks to biannual Pilates classes, I have legs that won't quit,
but they do slow down.
(SIGHS) Take those feet off, let me kick.
They don't come off. It's one piece.
No quality mascot suit has removable feet.
Take the suit off, then.
I can't.
Why not?
I'm not wearing anything underneath.
Look!
No, no, it's okay, I believe you.
No, look!
Look, an island!
Maybe the chipmunks washed up there.
Kick!
Faster! Come on.
Okay, there we go.
It won't be long before a rescue plane sees our SOS
and flies us back to civilization.
I don't hear any planes.
Or helicopters.
THEODORE: Maybe Dave is coming in a hot-air balloon.
Because those things are really quiet.
I don't think Dave is gonna be in a hot-air balloon.
But he is coming, right?
Of course he is.
Just maybe not today.
Alvin's right. We should prepare to stay the night.
What? You guys expect me to sleep outside?
Last I checked, Brit, we're chipmunks.
We're used to living in the wild.
No, we used to be used to living in the wild.
Come on, Brit, it's just one night.
One cold night.
So we'll make a fire. We're always setting things on fire accidentally.
translation.ko: 그럼 불을 피우자 실수로도 자주 불내는데

translation.en: How hard can it be when we put our minds to it?
And how are you intending to do that?
I will create a spark by striking this rock with my Swiss Army knife,
translation.ko: 만능 칼로 이 돌을 쳐서 불꽃 일으킬게

translation.en: which Dave took from me.
I suppose you have a better idea, smart guy?
As a matter of fact, I do, smart guy.
As you can see, the lens concentrates the energy of the sun,
thus creating fire!
Whoa. Impressive.
(AWKWARDLY) Thanks. Thank you.
Thanks for thinking that.
Hot, hot, hot! (YELPS)
We have made fire!
So, what do we do now?
Alvin! Brittany!
We've gotta head inland.
If we climb to the top of that mountain,
we'll be able to get a better view of the island,
see if they're here.
All right, got it.
What are you doing?
What? Building a fire.
You know, one time in the studio, Snoop ran out of matches,
translation.ko: 한번은 녹음실에서 성냥이 다 떨어지는 바람에

translation.en: got a blaze going with just two carrot sticks.
Figure, how hard can it be?
Forget the fire. We have to start hiking.
Yeah, okay, Dave. Look, it's getting dark-ish.
translation.ko: 안 됐거든? 날이 어두워지잖아 추워질 텐데

translation.en: It's gonna be cold. I'm gonna build a fire. We'll go in the morning.
translation.ko: 추워질 텐데 불 피우고 아침에 가자

translation.en: (SHOUTING ANGRILY) No, we'll go now.
Don't take that tone of voice with me, Dave.
I'm not one of your chipmunks that you can just boss around
and stuff into a cage whenever you feel like it.
That was you, Ian!
Calm down.
Jeez, no wonder those furballs would rather fly off the ship
than spend another day with you.
They didn't do it on purpose.
It was an accident. They're just kids.
I don't know how long they can survive out there.
ALVIN: And you guys were worried. (LAUGHING) Look at us!
We're warm, we got a great fire going, beautiful night sky
translation.ko: 몸 따뜻해, 모닥불 잘 타 밤하늘도 아름답고

translation.en: and if a rescue helicopter comes by, they'll see us!
translation.ko: 구조 헬기가 오면 우릴 볼 거야

translation.en: Everything's gonna be fine.
Good night, guys.
Good night.
Good night.
(YAWNS) Good night.
Night.
ALL: Theodore!
translation.ko: 테오도르! '잘 자' 하고 나면 데이브는 항상 불 끄잖아

translation.en: What? Dave always turns off the light after saying good night.
translation.ko: '잘 자' 하고 나면 데이브는 항상 불 끄잖아

translation.en: That fire was sort of the only thing keeping us from freezing to death.
Yeah!
Can't you just relight it?
How?
With your glasses. And the sun?
All right! Way to keep the spirits up, guys.
Doing it, yeah!
And what is this supposed to be?
Breakfast!
No, it's bark.
Yeah, for breakfast!
I bet it's very good.
It's not.
It's been forever since our last all-you-can-eat buffet.
translation.ko: 뷔페 가서 마음껏 먹어본 게 언젠지...

translation.en: Crazy suggestion, guys,
let's get off this beach and let's find some real food.
If I know my horticulture, and I do,
this is a grove of mango trees.
Then where are all the mangoes?
Maybe the Jungle Monster 4 ate them all!
You were planning on sharing that, right?
(LAUGHS NERVOUSLY) Of course.
Oh, well, good.
'Cause it kind of looked like you were gonna eat it all by yourself.
What? I would never do that.
translation.ko: 그럴 리가! 나 그런 다람쥐 아냐

translation.en: I don't believe you!
Yeah! Winning!
What?
I'll make sure to save you the pit!
Oh, my acorns!
Way to go, Theodore! Come on, we'll split it.
Don't listen to him, Theo.
He's gonna eat it all by himself.
I'll share it with you.
No. She's trying to trick you.
No, you're trying to trick him.
No, you're trying to trick him by saying I'm trying to trick him.
He's lying, Theo!
(GASPS) What?
Theodore, I am so sorry!
Oh, no!
My precious! My precious!
Stop it! Stop it! Stop it! Look at us.
One day on this island and we've become animals!
(GASPS) Did you hear that?
(GASPS) What was that?
Jungle Monster.
Positions, everybody.
Hold.
Hold.
Fire!
No! Why?
Please don't eat us, Mr. Jungle Monster!
I'm not a monster, I'm Zoe. And I'm clearly a girl
translation.ko: 난 괴물이 아니라 조이야 누가 봐도 여자고

translation.en: who has been on this island for so long
that now she's imagining that squirrels can talk.
translation.ko: 다람쥐가 사람 말을 하는 것처럼 들리네

translation.en: We are chipmunks.
Yeah, Alvin and the Chipmunks.
Who and the what now?
I'm sure you've heard of the Chipettes. We're kind of world famous.
Who?
Maybe this will help.
ALVIN: Lame! Okay. Stop.
I don't know who you are.
Awkward!
Exactly how long have you been here?
translation.ko: 이 섬에 온 지 얼마나 됐어요?

translation.en: Well, I got here on a Monday, so...
Yeah, like, you know, eight or nine years?
Nine years? Wait. You've been here nine years?
Well, it could be eight.
(GASPS) What if we're here nine years?
What if we're here forever?
I told you, Dave's coming.
I used to think that Dave was coming, too. And he never did.
translation.ko: 나도 데이브가 올 줄 알았는데 안 오더라

translation.en: Dave Henderson, my supervisor at UPS.
translation.ko: 데이브 헨더슨 내가 다니던 택배 회사 상사

translation.en: I used to fly cargo planes for them, until one day I crash-landed in the ocean.
We crash-landed, too.
Really?
But our Dave won't rest until he finds us.
translation.ko: 우리 데이브 아저씬 꼭 올 거예요

translation.en: Right, Alvin?
Absolutely. (CHUCKLES NERVOUSLY)
You mean I'm finally gonna get out of here?
I can't wait to go tell the others!
(GASPS) There are others?
I mean, can you guys imagine being stuck here for all these years
without anybody to talk to?
I think I'd lose my mind!
Chipmunks, I'm pleased to introduce my friends.
This is Rawlings, Spalding, Callaway,
Dunlop, and, right there, that's Nerf.
Hey, girlfriend, you look good.
They survived the crash with me.
Okay.
Hi. Hi.
Okay. Hello.
I'm Theodore.
Guys, Dave is coming to get us!
No, not Dave Henderson. I saw your face!
It's another Dave.
But, you guys, just get excited. We're finally gonna get off this island.
translation.ko: 신나지 않아? 이 섬을 벗어나게 됐잖아

translation.en: She's funny.
In a crazy sort of way.
This totally calls for a party. Who's hungry?
Yeah! Yes, please!
We are famished. I'm hungry.
Yeah? Let's go to my place.
Is it far? I don't think I could walk another step.
Who said anything about walking?
BRITTANY: We're gonna die!
Oh, man! That was so cool!
I know, I know!
Come on. Come on in, guys! Bring it in.
Come on down!
Yeah! Wasn't that awesome?
No, it was not awesome. It's a miracle we got here safely.
In fact, the odds of a chipmunk getting hurt on a zip-line are one out of six.
(GROANS) Why do I always have to be right?
Ellie, Ellie! Are you okay?
I think I sprained my ankle!
Ooh, you know what, you should put some ice on that.
Oh, no, guys, I don't have any ice. I live there in that tree.
I thought that maybe you did, though.
No, we don't have any ice. Just like we don't have any shelter.
Wow, that's a major bummer for you.
Do you guys like bungee jumping?
Yes!
No. We do not.
Listen, lady, maybe you should just leave us alone
so we can focus more on surviving and less on killing ourselves.
Whoa, that is a lot of uptight in a very little package.
translation.ko: 아주 쪼끄만 친구가 한 성깔 하네

translation.en: I'm not uptight. I just don't wanna see anyone else getting hurt. Ow!
translation.ko: 성깔 없어요 누가 다치는 게 싫다고요

translation.en: Criminy. What was that?
You know what, that was just a spider
and they live here because this is nature.
It is not just a spider, it's a Phoneutria bahiensis.
Its bite contains a neurotoxin.
Ooh! Mr. Fancy Words. So what?
translation.ko: 겁나 어려운 말 쓰시네 그게 뭐?

translation.en: Alvin, toxin? Poison? Neuro? Brain?
Oh. That's not good.
Side effects include changes in personality,
loss of inhibition, dry mouth.
Okay, calm down. I get bitten probably twice a day by these little fellows
translation.ko: 진정해, 난 하루에 두 번씩 물리는데

translation.en: and I am still completely normal.
Yes, normal.
Oh, no.
DAVE: Alvin? Simon!
Chubby one!
Girl chubby one!
Brittany? Jeanette?
I hope they're okay.
Who cares if they're okay? I just need them to be here.
And here I am thinking you've changed and don't only care about yourself.
translation.ko: 변한 줄 알았더니 못된 건 그대로네

translation.en: Nope. And it's a good thing, too.
Because right now the rage I'm feeling for you and those chipmunks
is the only thing keeping me going.
Shall we keep going?
Ian, just keep an eye out for something to eat or drink, all right?
All right. Right there!
Where?
That thing around your neck.
You're not gonna eat this. This was a gift from Theodore.
translation.ko: 이건 못 먹어 테오도르가 준 거야

translation.en: That explains it. I was gonna say, it's really ugly.
Like, really... Wow.
Ugly. It's not ugly.
It goes with everything and it's soft enough to sleep in.
translation.ko: 얼마나 부드러운지 목에 걸고 자도 돼

translation.en: Yeah, and it's edible.
You will not eat my son's necklace.
translation.ko: 우리 아들이 준 목걸이는 절대 못 먹어 아들 좋아하네

translation.en: He's not your son, Dave. He's just a chipmunk.
Oh, Dave. Where are you?
Where are you, Alvin?
IAN: All right.
I'm gonna crash.
Simon. Where are you going?
(WITH FRENCH ACCENT) Who is this Simon you speak of?
Um, you?
No, my name is not Simon. It is
Simone!
That's pretty close to Simon.
And yet completely different.
Would you care to join me on my adventure?
What adventure?
The adventure called life!
Okay.
But just until Dave shows up.
Alvin, Alvin!
Simon and Theodore are gone.
They probably just went to get stuff for the shelter.
It's all the guy can talk about.
Still, it's not like them to wander off like that.
Could you please go look for them?
Why can't you?
I have a situation of my own to deal with, Alvin.
Oh, right. How is Eleanor doing?
Huh? She's fine. I'm talking about me.
translation.ko: 걘 괜찮아 내 얘길 하는 거야

translation.en: It's been two days since my last bath and I am a mess.
translation.ko: 이틀째 목욕 못 해서 꼴이 엉망이야

translation.en: I can't get rescued looking like this.
Theo! Simon! Simon!
Theodore! Theo!
Si! Theo!
Bonjour, my friend.
Simon? Are you bungee jumping?
His name is not Simon.
It is Simone.
That's pretty close to Simon.
Yeah, I thought so, too. But he's acting totally different.
The spider bite! That's it! Remember the side effects?
Personality changes, loss of inhibition?
Lies! Who are you?
Wow! Simone is pretty cool.
It's Simon, Theodore. And, no, he's not.
Au revoir, Alfred.
Alvin. It's Alvin!
Whoo! C'est magnifique, Simone!
Okay, Theo, it's all you.
Really? I've never done anything like this.
And you never will.
How can you let him do this? What are you thinking?
I'm thinking, "When did my dad wash up on this island?"
What? We were having the best time.
translation.ko: 뭐라고요? 재밌게 노는데 왜 뻣뻣하게 굴어?

translation.en: Why do you have to show up and be so uptight?
Me? Uptight?
I'm not the uptight one, I'm the fun one! The cool one. Ask anybody.
Who should I ask? (LAUGHING)
Come on. Theodore, you can't bungee jump.
translation.ko: 테오도르 넌 번지점프 하면 안 돼

translation.en: You get scared just watching a movie.
Munk up, Alvin.
(MUFFLED) A little help?
Ah! Much better.
Jeanette, these dresses are, like, totally adorbs. I die.
Thank you. And I also made these for you, Eleanor.
Oh, look how handy you are all of a sudden.
translation.ko: 어쩜, 옷만 잘 만드는 게 아니었네

translation.en: And in case you get tired, I made you a wheelchair.
Oh, super.
A kiss. Enchante, mademoiselles.
A kiss. And a...
(LAUGHS) A kiss.
Spider venom. What's gotten into him?
Yeah, yeah, he thinks he's some sort of fun-loving French dude.
translation.ko: 자기가 완전 쿨한 프랑스 다람쥐인지 알아

translation.en: Now he thinks he's... Really?
translation.ko: 정말? 자기가 가장 재밌는 다람쥐인지 알지

translation.en: (MIMICKING SIMONE) The most interesting munk in the world.
Simon? Simon.
Simone? Oui?
I think we should get to work on that shelter.
Pourquoi? I cannot imagine a better roof over our heads than the stars in the sky.
translation.ko: 왜? 하늘의 별들보다 더 멋진 지붕은 없어

translation.en: What about the kind of roof over our head that's actually a roof?
translation.ko: 진짜 지붕이면 더 좋을 거 같은데?

translation.en: It's going to rain!
What is a little rain? Hmm?
translation.ko: 비 좀 맞으면 어때? 꽃을 만발하게 하는 생명수인데

translation.en: We cherish the water, for it is the water that nurtures the flower.
(THUNDER CRASHES) Okay. This is crazy!
Building a shelter was your idea. Yours!
Oh, great. Great!
All right, guys, we're gonna build a shelter.
I need everyone's help. Let's go.
I'll try. But I feel so useless.
What are you doing?
What I've wanted to do
since the moment I laid my eyes all over on you.
translation.ko: 처음 본 순간부터 하고 싶었던 거

translation.en: What? Huh?
Hey, you guys are going to catch pneumonia
dancing in the rain like that.
You ought to be careful kicking mud around like that.
Hello?
Someone could lose an eye!
That looks like fun.
Eleanor? Would you care to dance?
I'd love to.
With me? (LAUGHS) Yes, Theodore!
BRITTANY: I can't believe Jeanette's getting all the attention.
I'm the pretty one. Jeanette's the smart one.
translation.ko: 예쁜 애는 나란 말야 쟈넷은 똑똑한 애고

translation.en: You don't see me running around trying to be all smart, do you?
translation.ko: 내가 똑똑한 척하며 나서는 거 봤어?

translation.en: I know! I'm the fun one, you're the pretty one. Yeah!
Do you know how slippery that dirt is? This is ridiculous.
Are you even listening to me?
Simon!
Alvin? You're starting to sound like Dave.
(SCREAMING) No!
What are you doing?
Ugh. Building a shelter.
Since I'm not the fun one anymore
I figure I may as well be... (SHUDDERS)
The responsible one.
Ew. Really?
Well, since I'm not the pretty one anymore, maybe I should build a shelter, too.
translation.ko: 나도 이제 예쁜이 아니니까 집 만들어야겠다

translation.en: Yeah, good luck with that.
What, you don't think I could do it?
Hey, I didn't say that, Brit.
I thought it, but I didn't say it.
So you wanna play it this way.
He's so French.
Oh! Be careful, Simone!
Let's do it.
ELEANOR: Oh, no.
Now, wasn't that a pleasant ride?
Good thing we don't wear pants.
Okay, you guys, come on, come over.
Are you sure it's safe?
Of course it's safe.
I do this thing every day.
Jeanette! THEODORE: Jeanette!
Hold on, Jeanette.
No, no. Look into my eyes.
You have nothing to fear.
Yes, yes. Very good.
Voila! You are safe. Bravo!
You're so brave. You made it!
ELEANOR: Pretty.
Double rainbow. What does it mean?
Alive they're superstars, sure. But dead? They're legends.
translation.ko: 살아 있으면 슈퍼스타지만 죽으면 전설이 돼

translation.en: I'm talking about tribute albums, pay-per-view funerals.
Wait a second. You actually think I'm in this for the money?
translation.ko: 잠깐만, 내가 돈 때문에 이런다고 생각해?

translation.en: Well, if you're doing it to pick up chicks, you're doing a lousy job.
translation.ko: 여자 꼬일 목적이라면 지금껏 헛수고만 했지

translation.en: I'm doing this because I love them, okay?
Look, if you wanna spend the rest of your life
running around after a bunch of spoiled brats, be my guest.
They're not brats.
Really? Even Alvin?
You never even bothered to get to know them, Ian.
I mean, sure, Alvin can be kind of a handful,
but he means well.
He's sometimes just a little irresponsible, that's all.
But, come on, Simon?
He's probably the most level-headed kid I know.
If anything, he's a little too uptight.
And then there's little Theodore.
Dave, I barely cared about what you had to say about the first two.
translation.ko: 방금 얘기한 두 녀석한테도 관심 없지만

translation.en: I can't imagine the big-boned one is gonna be any more interesting.
Forget it, let's just keep going.
Up, poisson, up!
Oh, no. This is terrible.
Shouldn't he have come up by now?
Uh-oh. Simone! Where are you?
Zoe, you've gotta do something.
All right.
Callaway, I need you to go in there and find Simone.
I know you can do it, little buddy.
You're kidding, right?
If Callaway can't find him, nobody can. (EXCLAIMS IN PAIN)
(GASPS) Simone!
Told you.
I'm sorry if I caused you any worry, mademoiselle.
translation.ko: 걱정시켰다면 미안해 사과의 뜻으로 줄게 기분 풀릴 거야

translation.en: But I have something for you. Maybe this will be a way to make it up.
translation.ko: 사과의 뜻으로 줄게 기분 풀릴 거야

translation.en: Oh! It's beautiful!
Where did you find it?
Yeah, it is beautiful. Where did you find it?
In a cave behind the waterfall.
I thought it would look nice on you.
translation.ko: 이 아름다운 보석도 자기 미모에 비하면 너무 초라해 보여

translation.en: But now I realize even the most precious gem cannot compare to your beauty.
translation.ko: 자기 미모에 비하면 너무 초라해 보여

translation.en: Yeah. Were there any other jewels or gems or diamonds
or anything else in there?
By the time I found the gold,
I had already been gone from my Jeanette far too long.
translation.ko: 쟈넷을 너무 오랫동안 떠나있었단 생각이 들었죠

translation.en: What?
You guys, they found it. They found it!
And the best part is, they don't even know what they found.
translation.ko: 근데 자기들이 뭘 찾은 지도 몰라

translation.en: They think that it's just one bracelet. Which means that the rest of the treasure is mine.
translation.ko: 걔들이 가져간 팔찌 하나 빼곤 전부 다 내 거라고!

translation.en: All mine! (LAUGHING MANIACALLY)
(GRUNTING) What the...
Whoa! What are you?
Yeah, you're one of those honey badgers.
You just take what you want.
Drop it. Drop it!
You mess with me, ese,
I'll go loco on you.
Give it back!
You can sting like a bee or strike like a cobra, but this honey munk don't care!
translation.ko: 벌처럼 쏘고 뱀처럼 물어도 이건 내 거야!

translation.en: Okay, Brit, I'm all done.
If you want, I can help you get started...
This tree house is awesome.
Maybe you are kind of the smart one.
Thank you, Alvin. And yours is...
Well,
you did your best.
Anyhoo, no reason we can't be comfortable and stylish
while we wait for Dave to show up, right?
Brit, I...
I think I know why Dave hasn't come.
translation.ko: 데이브가 왜 안 오는지 알 거 같아

translation.en: You do? Why?
'Cause he's not even looking.
Alvin, why wouldn't he be looking for us?
Because I drive him crazy.
You know, the way Simon's been driving me crazy?
I mean, that's what I've been doing to Dave. For years.
translation.ko: 내가 그렇게 데이브를 오랫동안 괴롭혀 왔어

translation.en: No wonder he hates me.
Don't worry, Alvin.
I'm sure Dave will come.
I mean, he certainly loves Simon and Theodore.
Simon? Is Dave ever gonna find us?
Simon? I mean, Simone?
I'm so sorry, were you speaking to moi?
Yes! About Dave!
Are we ever going to find him?
I see you are sad, mon ami.
And I hate to see you sad.
I will help you find your friend Dave.
You really think you can find him?
I know I can!
And then I will find this Simon you keep speaking of!
translation.ko: 그리고 네가 말한 사이먼도 찾을 거야

translation.en: As Dave and I have never met, I will need you to describe him for me.
translation.ko: 난 데이브를 모르니 어떤 자인지 말해봐

translation.en: Well, he's very kind and a good storyteller.
Mmm-hmm. Very helpful.
Oh! And he's about this tall.
Is he by any chance a big, flightless bird?
translation.ko: 혹시 몸집이 크고 날지 못하는 새야?

translation.en: I don't think so.
Then these footprints must not be his.
(GASPS) Jungle Monster!
Do you hear that?
Yeah, it's my stomach grumbling.
No, no, maybe it's a helicopter! Listen!
Face it, Dave, no one is coming to rescue us, okay?
And my stomach noises are gonna get louder and louder and louder
translation.ko: 내 배에서 나는 소리가 계속 커지다가

translation.en: until one day they just stop.
Because I will have eaten you.
Maybe you're right. Maybe no one's coming.
translation.ko: 네 말처럼 구조대가 안 올지 몰라

translation.en: Maybe the chipmunks aren't here at all. Maybe they're gone.
I really messed up.
Dave, it kills me to say this, kills me, but...
translation.ko: 이런 말 하는 거 나도 정말 가슴 아프지만

translation.en: Look, man,
(SIGHS) you're really good with those kids, really good.
They love you.
And I should know because I was really bad with those kids and they hate me.
translation.ko: 난 너무 못 해줘서 걔들이 싫어하지

translation.en: But, look, you should know that whatever happens,
you did nothing wrong. Nothing.
Thanks, Ian.
Come here.
Ian?
Ian?
Ian!
The Jungle Monster's real! And it's angry!
translation.ko: 정글 몬스터가 진짜 있었어 지금 화가 났나 봐!

translation.en: Or hungry. Allons-y!
That means let's go.
Great, a volcano.
Of course! That's why the water was so hot!
It's being heated by the underground magma chamber!
How do you know that?
I have no idea!
The place where I get my nails done always has the Science Channel on.
translation.ko: 내 단골 네일숍에서 사이언스 채널 트는데

translation.en: Maybe I accidentally paid attention.
Hey, guys, anyone up for a quick hike?
Like, I don't know, maybe to the waterfall or whatever?
Not now, Zoe! The whole island is going to explode!
What?
translation.ko: 뭐? 이 섬을 벗어나야 해 당장 뗏목을 만들자

translation.en: Guys, we've got to get off this island. We have to build a raft, now.
translation.ko: 이 섬을 벗어나야 해 당장 뗏목을 만들자

translation.en: "Right now" like, right now?
Or "right now" like, after a hike to the waterfall now?
(GRUNTS) I've been hit!
By Dave's necklace?
Tell Jeanette I will watch over her with angel wings.
Dave?
Theodore!
SIMONE: Dave? Ha ha!
Told you we'd find him!
Simon!
It is Simone, but I am often confused for this Simon fellow.
Perhaps we look alike?
Simone?
Ian!
Hey, you found the chubby one.
DAVE: Don't worry, Theodore.
Nothing's gonna happen to you. Is it?
translation.ko: 아무 일 없을 거야 안 그래?

translation.en: (WHIMPERS) What was that?
That's an active volcano.
Okay, Brittany and I will build the deck.
Eleanor, you need to start braiding ropes.
Jeanette, find as many coconuts and mangoes as you can.
Who knows how long we'll be out there.
What can I do to help?
Dave! Dave!
ELEANOR: Dave!
(GIGGLES EXCITEDLY) You found us! Hey.
We missed you so much.
I knew you would find us.
Eleanor! What happened?
You know, just a zip-line accident.
A what? I'm fine.
translation.ko: 뭐라고? 괜찮아요 기억 떠올릴 때만 아프죠

translation.en: It only hurts when I try to explain it.
Okay, you know what, never mind.
The important thing is you guys are safe.
Alvin?
Everything's gonna be okay.
Hey, what is it?
I thought you'd never find us.
That you weren't even looking.
Why wouldn't I look for you?
Because I'm such a pain in the...
Alvin.
I know, you don't think I'm a pain.
No, you're a pain. But I'd come, no matter what.
SIMONE: Arc de Triomphe, mayonnaise, Napoleon.
I get it, Frenchie, you come from a rich history.
Well, guess what, we're all gonna be history if we don't get out of here.
translation.ko: 이 섬을 안 벗어나면 우린 역사가 될 거야

translation.en: CHIPETTES: (GASPING) Uncle Ian!
What's he doing here?
It's kind of a long story.
Don't worry, he's cool.
Yes, for a pelican man.
Oh, yeah, nothing cooler than a grown man in a pelican suit.
translation.ko: 그래, 얼마나 쿨하면 펠리컨 옷 입고 있겠냐

translation.en: So, Dave, how are we gonna get out of here?
I don't know, Alvin, I think you've got this under control.
Theodore, you and Eleanor are on rope duty.
Dave and Ian, we need oars.
Simone, you and Jeanette are in charge of food.
And, Zoe...
No, I know, I know.
I'm gonna go and I'm gonna pack up my balls!
Who's that?
Another long story.
Yeah! Good work, guys! Let's get off this island.
This raft won't build itself.
Go! Go! Go!
Heave! ALVIN: Ho!
BRITTANY: Heave! ALVIN: Ho!
Heave! ALVIN: Ho!
It's incredible, you guys.
Very impressive.
Just seeing everyone come together to build it...
(VOLCANO RUMBLING) I just want to say...
It can wait.
Wait, where are Jeanette and Simone?
(EXHALING) I hope this is going to be enough.
(GASPS) Did you hear something?
Who can say?
When I am with you, all I can hear is the beating of my own heart.
translation.ko: 그대와 함께 있으면 내 심장 소리만 들려

translation.en: Oh, Simone!
(PANTING) Oh, no!
Oh, no!
Somebody! Help!
Jeanette?
ALVIN: Guys! Guys! Over here! Come quick, hurry!
Simone, are you okay?
Simone!
Why are you calling me Simone? Simon?
Yeah.
(LAUGHS) You're back! It finally wore off!
What wore off?
You were bitten by a spider. It, like, messed up your brain.
Ah. Is that why I think I see Dave
and a half-Ian, half-bird?
No, it's really me. And really Ian.
'Sup?
Simon, where's Jeanette? She was out here with you.
Jeanette? I don't know...
I do.
It's Zoe. She took her.
Simon, I need to know where you found that gold bracelet.
translation.ko: 사이먼, 말해봐 그 금팔찌 어디서 찾았어?

translation.en: What gold bracelet?
The one you gave to Jeanette.
What? When did I give Jeanette a bracelet?
On your date.
(GASPS) Jeanette and I are dating?
Okay, he's useless.
Theodore, Eleanor, you're gonna have to lead the way.
I don't remember exactly how to get there.
translation.ko: 가는 길이 잘 기억 안 나

translation.en: I do!
Which way, Eleanor?
Make a left. No, right. No, left!
I thought you said you knew where you were going.
I do! Sometimes I just forget my left from my right.
That way!
Okay, we just have to cross here.
(GASPS) Are you kidding me?
Guys, I can't do that.
But, Simon, you already did.
No, I didn't. That was Simone, that was not me.
But Simone is you. He's in there somewhere.
translation.ko: 그렇지만 시몬이 너잖아 네 안 어딘가에 있을 거야

translation.en: You just have to find him, tout de suite.
Because Jeanette needs you, Simon.
No, I'm sorry, I just can't do it.
All right, Ian, get everyone to the raft.
If the volcano blows before I make it out of here,
you have to promise me you'll...
Leave without you. Got it.
(SIGHS) Okay.
Dave.
I'm coming with you.
Absolutely not, it's too dangerous.
Remember I said someday I may need to disobey you?
translation.ko: 말을 못 들을 상황이 생길 거랬죠?

translation.en: Sorry, Dave, but I gotta disobey you.
Let's go.
You're not coming up until you have every last bit of that treasure.
translation.ko: 하나도 남기지 말고 보물을 전부 가져와

translation.en: But the volcano is about to explode!
Well, then I guess you better hurry, huh?
Run, go, go. In you go.
Get down there. That's right.
Keep going!
Keep moving!
Okay! Pull me up. I can't hold any more.
translation.ko: 이제 올려줘요 더는 못 담아요! 말하는 걸 보니 입엔 안 담았네!

translation.en: If you can still talk, it means you haven't stuffed your cheeks yet! (MUFFLED SHOUTING)
translation.ko: 말하는 걸 보니 입엔 안 담았네!

translation.en: Yes! That sounds very good.
Jeanette!
ALVIN: Dave!
They're supposed to be behind that waterfall!
That's right. That's what I'm talking about. (MUFFLED SPEECH)
ALVIN: Zoe!
No, no. Not another step.
Don't come any closer.
Are you all right, Jeanette?
I'm pretty freaked out,
and those earrings tasted awful.
Zoe, you don't have to do this.
Oh, I don't? I spent 10 years looking for this treasure.
translation.ko: 웃기지 마! 이 보물 찾느라 10년 걸렸어

translation.en: It's the whole reason why I came to this stinking island!
translation.ko: 보물만 아녔으면 이 섬에 오지도 않았어!

translation.en: You mean you didn't crash-land?
They said that I was crazy and they said that this map was a fake.
translation.ko: 다들 내가 미쳤다며 이 지도가 가짜랬지

translation.en: And now the treasure is mine! (GROUND RUMBLING)
Run!
Jeanette, come on, come on.
Run!
(SQUEALS) ZOE: No, you don't!
Jeanette!
Oh, no!
JEANETTE: Help, help!
Oh, no, help!
You're going back in that cave, and you are going to get me more treasure.
translation.ko: 동굴에 다시 들어가서 보물을 더 가져와

translation.en: Jeanette!
Simone!
It's Simon!
(DISTORTED) Alvin!
(DISTORTED) No!
DAVE: Come on, guys, go! Hurry!
Go, go!
Come on, come on.
Look!
Come on!
Run!
But where's Dave?
Help me up!
Oh, help you up?
Is that what I'm supposed to do now, Dave?
All I had was my treasure, and now it's gone.
Do you get that? My life is ruined.
And now you're gonna know how that feels.
No, no!
IAN: It's tempting to blame Dave.
I know. I've been there.
I wish I could get back all those years I spent plotting my revenge.
translation.ko: 복수를 꿈꾸며 허비한 시간을 되돌리고 싶어

translation.en: All that time and energy, wasted.
All those pizzas I had delivered to his house, wasted.
translation.ko: 저 친구 집으로 장난 배달시킨 피자도

translation.en: That was you?
Not now, Dave! All right?
You could let Dave fall to his death
and I could go back to the raft with the chipmunks,
become their manager again and make tons of money.
So, really, I'm good either way.
But let me tell you something.
Hate, anger, regret,
those aren't just members of a girl group I once signed.
They're what consumed me. And they're consuming you.
translation.ko: 날 병들게 했어 당신도 병들게 하고 있고

translation.en: It's not too late to do the right thing.
translation.ko: 옳은 일을 해 아직 안 늦었어

translation.en: Or not. Again,
I'm good either way, so...
I don't want to sway you.
What are you guys doing? Help me.
Please. Help me save my dad!
Hurry!
I got you, Dave.
Come on! Help me, guys.
There they are!
SIMON: Come on!
Faster!
JEANETTE: Hurry! Hurry!
ALVIN: Let's go, go, go!
Oh, no!
Get up!
Hurry!
DAVE: Come on! Come on! ZOE: Come on!
BRITTANY: Run!
Grab the oar!
Come on! Come on, guys!
Paddle!
Come on! Paddle!
Faster! Come on, hurry!
Now we'll never get to perform at the International Music Awards.
I guess now we're the losers.
Jeanette, I don't know what to say.
I guess I was just so obsessed with finding that treasure
that I kind of... I lost it.
And I'm...
I'm really sorry.
We both are.
Well, apology accepted.
Here, I want you to have this.
Really?
Look, Dunlop, this is a new beginning
for both of us.
I hope you don't mind.
Simone gave it to me.
Oh, I don't mind.
You know, Jeanette, even the most perfect gem
cannot compare to your beauty.
Dave?
Yes, Alvin?
I just wanted to say
now that we're not all, you know, dead,
sorry.
Sorry.
Sorry I was acting like a child on the ship.
And kind of maybe ruined our family vacation.
Sometimes a racehorse needs a little room to run.
Yes. Yeah. I like where your head's at.
That is very wise, David.
IAN: 'Sup?
What, no love for Uncle Ian?
You put us in cages! You put us in cages!
Seriously? Are we still talking about that?
New subject, I saved Dave's life.
Okay, but I'll be watching you, mister.
Alvin, you still have that pocket knife I gave you?
translation.ko: 앨빈, 그 만능 칼 가지고 있어?

translation.en: Knife? Oh, right, sorry, I meant to give it back.
I want you to keep it.
Really?
Maybe you can use it to signal that helicopter. (WHIRRING)
What?
Hey! Down here!
Hello!
It's me, Ian Hawke! Jet Records!
translation.ko: 나 이안이에요! 전직 제트 음반사 사장!

translation.en: DAVE: Guys, circle around!
MAN ON MEGAPHONE: Everything's okay. We got you, guys!
It's good to be back, huh?
Sure is.
Sold Zoe's story to Hollywood. Huge bidding war.
Keira Knightley is interested.
I'm thinking Fiddy Cent for me.
Thank you!
Thank you! Thank you.
You're a great audience. We love you!
I'm sorry, sir, that's full.
We're gonna have to gate-check those.
(SIGHS) Are you gonna charge me 25 bucks a bag?
Of course not, sir.
It's $25 for the first bag
and $40 for each additional bag.
I'm a little chilly. Would you mind adjusting the vent?
But of course.
Oh! You wrinkled my business magazine.
Sorry.
Guess I'll have to read this.
Ooh, she's pretty.
translation.ko: 다른 거 읽을래 너무 예쁘다 "팝스타 브리트니!"

translation.en: Oh, wait, that's me.
All right, head count.
You like my Jungle Monster costume? Eleanor made it for me.
Yeah! Out of a barf bag!
Nice.
Where's Alvin?
ALVIN: Ladies and gentlemen, this is your captain speaking.
We're cleared for an on-time departure for Timbuktu.
If Timbuktu is not for you,
translation.ko: 비행기를 잘못 타셨다면 승무원을 불러 말씀해주십시오

translation.en: please alert the flight attendant by pressing your call button.
Alvin!
Thank you for choosing Air Alvin. Enjoy your flight!
(CALL BUTTONS DINGING)
translation.ko: 앨빈 항공을 이용해주셔서 감사합니다 자리에 앉아주세요 곧 이륙해요

translation.en: Sir, please return to your seat, we're about to take off.
Uh-oh. Sit. Now.
But he... Sit!
No, no, no!
(SCREAMING) Alvin!
